definitions.definition: A small design etched on the margin of a plate and supposed to be removed after the earliest proofs have been taken.
Any feature distinguishing a particular stage of the plate.
A print or proof distinguished by such a mark.

main_definition: ( engraving ) A small design etched on the margin of a plate and supposed to be removed after the earliest proofs have been taken.
secondary_definitions: ( engraving ) Any feature distinguishing a particular stage of the plate.
( engraving ) A print or proof distinguished by such a mark.
